updates.content: 09/02/2023 | An emergency change has been scheduled for 23:00 to 05:00 to attend to the ongoing intermittent connection being experienced. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
Frogfoot technicians continue to work on the fibre breaks affecting connections in Pamula Park.

-- Technicians tested a second disconnection at 21.468KM and a distance of 33.232km.
